roleset.name: coming up short

role.descr: domain in which arg1 is coming up short

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: arg0
example.text: He was n't the head of the ECB but one of the Vice Presidents , ie in the governing council of the ECB . For all the shortcomings of the Euro , I ca n't see how the ECB has done a bad job .

example.name: Both args
example.text: McCain tapped his good friend Phil Gramm to help with his economic shortcomings.
